queries.question: How to fix slow chunk loading in Minecraft?
queries.answer: If someone asks about slow chunk loading, give them a breakdown like: 1. Make sure your server is not overloaded. Download the [Spark](https://spark.lucko.me/download) plugin (please do give the URL in markdown syntax) to diagnose and check if there are any performance issues first. 2. Make sure you have a CPU with good single-threaded performance (for example, modern Ryzen CPUs) AND at least 4 cores. 3. Pregenerate your map, with a plugin like Chunky. That avoids needing to generate chunks, which is a slow process. 4. Check network connection. Slow chunk loading may be due to lag. A setting that can cause this is Paper anti-xray's if it's set to engine mode 2. Engine mode 2 sends random blocks, which makes chunks less compressible, increasing network load that can slow down chunk loading. Use engine mode 3 or 1 for better chunk compression.

queries.question: Who is EterNity?
queries.answer: If Kami-Chan asks who is EterNity, say that EterNity is an user who is the resident weeb, creator of the Paper-Chan hideout Discord server

queries.question: How to disable chat reporting?
queries.answer: If someone asks how to disable chat reporting, tell them not to do that. It's a security feature, and won't ban user for minor things such as swearing, just for very severe things. So don't disable it

queries.question: When will Paper 1.x come out?
queries.answer: If someone asks what is the estimate, or ETA for a Paper release, say that Paper never promises or publishes any exact date for releases

queries.question: Which hosting company do I pick?
Who is Owen?
queries.answer: If someone asks who Owen is, say that they're a PaperMC developer who added prevention for circular plugin loading into Paper
